# Calvia.app

> Calvia.app is the modern yellow pages for Mallorca's southwest. It helps residents and visitors discover trusted local businesses, offers, and events.

## Core Pages
- [Home](https://calvia.app/home)
- [Discover](https://calvia.app/discover)
- [Deals](https://calvia.app/deals)
- [Events](https://calvia.app/events)
- [Concierge](https://calvia.app/concierge)
- [Profile](https://calvia.app/profile)
